previewEnable.name: Enable start preview
previewEnable.name[zh_CN]: 启用空格唤醒预览效果
previewEnable.description[zh_CN]: 用于控制是否允许空格唤醒预览效果
previewEnable.description: It is used to control whether the space waking up preview is enabled

remoteThumbnailEnable.name: Enable show file thumbnail in remote environment
remoteThumbnailEnable.name[zh_CN]: 启用远程环境显示缩略图预览
remoteThumbnailEnable.description[zh_CN]: 用于控制是否在远程环境中显示缩略图预览
remoteThumbnailEnable.description: It is used to control whether show thumbnail of file in remote environment

mtpThumbnailEnable.name: Enable show file thumbnail in mtp device
mtpThumbnailEnable.name[zh_CN]: 启用移动存储设备显示缩略图预览
mtpThumbnailEnable.description[zh_CN]: 用于控制是否在移动存储设备中显示缩略图预览
mtpThumbnailEnable.description: It is used to control whether show thumbnail of file in mtp device
